title: Log Event Request
description: Request parameters for logging marketing events

event_source_id.description: Event source configured on the account via sync_event_sources

test_event_code.description: Test event code for validation without affecting production data. Events with this code appear in the platform's test events UI.

sandbox.description: When true, run in sandbox mode. No real platform calls, no real money spent. Responses contain simulated but realistic data.
